name: CBPeripheralManager
desc: An object that manages and advertises peripheral services exposed by this app.

items.name: delegate
items.desc: The delegate object specified to receive peripheral events.

items.name: authorizationStatus
items.desc: Returns the appâ€™s authorization status for sharing data while in the background.

items.name: CBPeripheralManagerAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: Values representing the current authorization state of the peripheral manager.

items.name: CBPeripheralManagerState
items.desc: Values that represent the current state of the peripheral manager.

items.name: add
items.desc: Publishes a service and any of its associated characteristics and characteristic descriptors to the local GATT database.

items.name: remove
items.desc: Removes a specified published service from the local GATT database.

items.name: removeAllServices
items.desc: Removes all published services from the local GATT database.

items.name: isAdvertising
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the peripheral is advertising data.

items.name: updateValue
items.desc: Send an updated characteristic value to one or more subscribed centrals, using a notification or indication.

items.name: respond
items.desc: Responds to a read or write request from a connected central.

items.name: setDesiredConnectionLatency
items.desc: Sets the desired connection latency for an existing connection to a central device.

items.name: CBPeripheralManagerConnectionLatency
items.desc: Values representing the connection latency of the peripheral manager.

items.name: publishL2CAPChannel
items.desc: Creates a listener for incoming L2CAP channel connections.

items.name: unpublishL2CAPChannel
items.desc: Removes a published service from the local system.
